summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, forwarding contact information for an Acting Warden and noting that the Deputy Attorney General (DAG) called to offer gratitude and support. It appears to be internal Department of Justice communication regarding prison administration matters.

persons.name: Regional Director Northeast Region
persons.context: Appears to be forwarding contact information for an Acting Warden to someone referred to as 'Boss'.

events.title: DAG Call Offering Gratitude
events.description: The Deputy Attorney General called to offer gratitude and support in a brief conversation.

keyFacts: The Deputy Attorney General (DAG) called to offer gratitude and support on August 13, 2019.
Contact information for an Acting Warden (including private line and work cell) was forwarded in this email chain.
The communication is internal DOJ correspondence regarding prison administration.
The email is dated August 14, 2019, and references events from the previous day.
